idea:
We are one of the leading Constructions & Interior, Infrastructure Development and Management Company of the India. We are based in Mumbai but operational in all over India.

Dbuild is specialist in Interior and Infrastructure construction. Interior and Real estate development are the main business of Dbuild. It is a multifaceted business, encompassing activities that range from land development, real estate development and management to construction and investment, with such products as Residential, Villas, Office , Hotels, Restaurants, Industrial Setup, Road, Solar Power Plant and Wind Power Plant etc.

The company providing turnkey services for commercial and residential construction and interior fit-out projects. With our team of professionals, we deliver projects on time, on budget and with an exceptional level of quality.

Our engagement is not only to keep up our track record of absolute delivery, but also to ensure a smooth handing over to our Clients by remaining involved in the project after its handover.

We believe in transparency, we act as a competent contractor at all times, keeping our Clients and their representatives fully informed at all stages of the project.

We care about our people, we are committed to provide working conditions that are the safest and the healthiest possible in all circumstances.


Our Website
name: DBUILD INFRA INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Navitus Enterprise Learning Products


navitusCorporate is a suite of tightly integrated products to enable employee skillsets, improve employee learning, enhance productivity & collaboration. Its goal is to provide all the main tools for Employee Lifecycle Management (ELM), such as, Learning Management System (navitusLMS), Micro-Learning System (navitusBytes), Performance Monitoring & Feedback (navitusPerformance). Additional products such as Corporate Chat, Sales/Lead Managment and Video Conferencing are scheduled to be incorporated over the next few months.

navitusLMS: navitusLMS is a world-class, award winning Learning Management System automating Learning & Development initiatives within an organization. It can be used in any of the learning modes, viz., Self-paced, Virtual Classroom and Physical Classroom Training (Trainer Automation). It is a multi-tenant, fully scalable architecture, supports gamification and mobile learning.

navitusBytes is a unique mobile application that can be used as a stand-alone service or added as a premium service.  It is geared towards micro-learning with smart/short snippets and can be integrated with sales to boost its effectiveness.

navitusPerformance is a unique mobile application that can be added as a premium service. It is aimed at improving employee performance through continuous learning and regular feedback. It is a critical tool at the time of annual performance review.

We are working on launching 3 additional products to complete the suite over the next few months: Corporate Chat, Sales/Lead Management and Video Conferencing.
name: Navitus Education Private Limited

idea:
OyePlus is our contributional response to the web world that combines social networking and increases the productivity of the users, maintaining beneficial standards of interest-based communities. It is architectured with an intelligent algorithm that enhances social life and along with engrossed participation of the users as by their nature of interests.

App features

Follow/Unfollow people

Create Profiles

Create and join communities based on your interests

Create Post on profiles/communities

Reply on posts

Push notifications

Trending Hashtags

Create a page (Planned feature)

Direct messages (Planned feature)

Normal/Video calling (Planned feature)
name: OyePlus
